title: World Machine Docker Image
description:
This record contains an export of the Docker image {image.name}:{image.tag}. The Docker image can be used to run the World Machine and to research experiments created with it.

World Machine is a research project that investigates the concept and creation of computational world models. These AI systems create internal representations to understand and make predictions about the external world. See the project page for more information. The project is part of the H.IAAC, the Hub for Artificial Intelligence and Cognitive Architecture, located at the Universidade Estadual de Campinas (UNICAMP), Brazil.

Usage

The image can be imported using the command docker load with the image file:

docker load -i image.tar.gz

or with the donodo command available at https://github.com/pauleve/donodo (swh:1:dir:3c23b84c86526b41333c09093e56593028e3873b):

pip install -U donododonodo pull [DOI]

or downloaded direct from Docker Hub:

docker pull eltoncn/world-machine:0.1


The image entry-point is a bash terminal. Enter the terminal using:

docker attach <container-name>
